title: Mozibul Hoque elected chairman of UAP Board of Trustees
description: Unanimously elected, Mr Hoque will lead UAP boards, bringing extensive experience in education, business, and international leadershipDetails

title: CIA won't deny it has 3I/Atlas records monitoring mystery suspected UFO
description: The mystery surrounding the suspected UFO the 3I/Atlas space object has deepened as the CIA has refused to disclose if they have documents monitoring space object

title: World : German UFO Centre LoggedÂ Record Number Of Sightings In 2025
description: WIESBADEN (Germany), Jan 6 (Bernama-dpa) -- The UFO reporting centre CENAP located in western Germany this year recorded more sightings by puzzled citizens than ever before, its director said on Monday, reported German Press Agency (dpa).

title: TAT banks on UFO believers, night economy to lift tourism revenue to 3tn baht in 2026
description: Thailand’s TAT is betting on the night economy and sub-culture tourism — including a planned “UFO Festival” — as it targets at least 3 trillion baht in tourism revenue in 2026, with 36.7 million foreign arrivals projected in its baseline scenario.

title: Longview Welcomes Bigfoot and UFO Enthusiasts to the Ultimate SQuatch and Galactic Festival in 2026
description: Longview Welcomes Bigfoot and UFO Enthusiasts to the Ultimate SQuatch and Galactic Festival in 2026Join the excitement at SQuatch Fest + Galactic Fest 2026 in Longview, WA, for Bigfoot lore, UFO talks, and family fun.The post Longview Welcomes Bigfoot and UFO Enthusiasts to the Ultimate SQuatch and Galactic Festival in 2026 appeared first on Travel And Tour World.
